issues.detailed_explaination: The use of the expression '${owner['new']}' in the button's 'th:with' attribute is not a standard way to check for a property in Thymeleaf. It should be '${owner.new}' instead.
issues.suggestion: Change 'th:with="text=${owner['new']} ? 'Add Owner' : 'Update Owner'"' to 'th:with="text=${owner.new} ? 'Add Owner' : 'Update Owner'"'.
issues.severity_reason: This could lead to unexpected behavior in the application.
